name: Reverie: A wholesome RPG (DEMO)
description:
Reverie: A Wholesome RPG is a passion project and love letter to old-school jrpgs, top-down zelda games and kirby-style kid-friendly cosmic horror (though that part isn't really part of the demo).

While this game's core elements should be familiar to anyone who's played a jrpg - turn-based combat, a choice of class for every character, a group of friends going on an adventure - its goal is to avoid the typical set of classes, worlds, and aesthetics already done by other games.
